about_the_game:
Welcome to the Kitty Academy.
Add numbers, memorize the plus and reach the goal. Reveal and prove that you got it right. Earn amazing Badges, Increase speed and level. It's a test for your brain. A simple game of mental skill, with 2 game modes, Classic and Advanced. Play and overcome to the limit.

Classic Mode.
Challenge your brain, guess the number. Just enjoy adding or test yourself by increasing the speed. Different students will accompany you in your sessions every day. Enjoy the game, is your choice.

Advanced Mode.
Blocked in Demo.

You've probably never tested your brain so hard with such a simple game.
Moderation is recommended.

name: Grand Numbers Plus Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
